VERY VERY short by detailed article (^_^)

"Hide's memoirs reveal what happened to ordinary people caught up in 
the reverberating public events that set Japan on its modern 
course.  The overthrow of the Tokugawa shogunate in 1867 wrenched 
Hide, her family and friends from the security of their inherited 
status....they now had to scramble to make a living."

something about shoe repairs
